misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
vulnerable_code: Crypto algorithm used is 'RC4', which is considered broken and should not be used.
description: The use of 'RC4' algorithm is a serious vulnerability as it is easily broken and can be exploited by attackers to decrypt the data. It is recommended to use a stronger and more secure algorithm instead.
